m_szDocTitle: China Solar Antidumping Case Settled | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: China Solar Antidumping Case Settled This article was first published on Lenz Blog . EU Commissioner  De Gucht has announced  that the antidumping case on Chinese solar panels has been settled. Chinese makers will have to sell solar panels at a minimum price, and there will be a ceiling on exports to the EU from China. The official release doesn’t tell us any details, but there are multiple press reports putting the minimum price at 56 Cents Euro per watt, which would translate to 560 Euro per kW of capacity. See for example  this article at SPIEGEL (in German) . From the same article, we lear
